TABLE.NAME: block_news
TABLE.COMMENT: main settings for each block instance

FIELD.NAME: blockinstanceid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of block that these settings are for

FIELD.NAME: title
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of block

FIELD.NAME: nummessages
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of messages to show

FIELD.NAME: summarylength
FIELD.COMMENT: Length of summary in characters, or 0 if turned off

FIELD.NAME: hidetitles
FIELD.COMMENT: 1 to hide message titles, 0 to show

FIELD.NAME: hidelinks
FIELD.COMMENT: 1 to hide message links, 0 to show

FIELD.NAME: groupingsupport
FIELD.COMMENT: 1 to enable grouping support

FIELD.NAME: displaytype
FIELD.COMMENT: Default display or Separate into events and news items

TABLE.NAME: block_news_feeds
TABLE.COMMENT: Lists all feeds used for each block instance

FIELD.NAME: blockinstanceid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of block that this feed is for

FIELD.NAME: feedurl
FIELD.COMMENT: URL of Atom or RSS feed

FIELD.NAME: currenthash
FIELD.COMMENT: Hash of current data (null if no data yet)

FIELD.NAME: feedupdated
FIELD.COMMENT: Time (seconds since epoch) at which the system last tried to update this feed

FIELD.NAME: feederror
FIELD.COMMENT: Error message last time the system tried to update the feed, or null if no error

FIELD.NAME: blockinstanceid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of block that contains this message

FIELD.NAME: newsfeedid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of row in block_news_feeds that this message is related to, or null if it was manually entered and is not from a feed

FIELD.NAME: title
FIELD.COMMENT: Message title (plain text)

FIELD.NAME: link
FIELD.COMMENT: Message URL (only for messages from feeds; null if none)

FIELD.NAME: message
FIELD.COMMENT: Message contents

FIELD.NAME: messageformat
FIELD.COMMENT: Format of message

FIELD.NAME: messagedate
FIELD.COMMENT: Date of message (seconds since epoch)

FIELD.NAME: messagevisible
FIELD.COMMENT: 1 if message is visible, 0 if it’s hidden

FIELD.NAME: messagerepeat
FIELD.COMMENT: 1 if Repeat this message is visible, 0 if it’s hidden

FIELD.NAME: hideauthor
FIELD.COMMENT: 1 if Hide author name is chosen

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Time at which message was edited

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of person who last edited the message, null for messages from feeds.

FIELD.NAME: groupingid
FIELD.COMMENT: = id of a grouping containing this news item. 0 indicates all groupings.

FIELD.NAME: groupid
FIELD.COMMENT: = id of a group can access this news item. 0 indicates all groups.

FIELD.NAME: messagetype
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether message is a 'news item' (1) or calendar event (2)
